long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Join millions of happy customers and earn cash back from over 4000 online stores present across 22 countries! No need to search for the discount deals as the RewardPay Extension will ease all your online shopping activities. Find the RewardPay logo on your browser, and enjoy the endless savings! 

RewardPay is one of the best cash back companies and the new RewardPay extension comes with additional features such as beneficial reminders of cashback % on your favourite online store and option of turning on & off the alerts from the Google search.
